 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעִיל‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[1Sam.2.19|1Sam 2:19]]</sup> ==robe== ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] conjecture original meaning ***cover*** for √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מעל‎</span>, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בגד‎</span>; [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup> ES 15</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***an outer garment***, but against this [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>ThLz, Apr. 28, 1894, 235</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Exod.28.31|Exod 28:31]] + 18 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעִילוֺ‎</span> [[1Sam.15.27|1Sam 15:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעִלוֺ‎</span> [[Job.1.20|Job 1:20]]; [[Job.2.12|Job 2:12]] + 4 t. singular; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעִילִים‎</span> [[2Sam.13.18|2Sam 13:18]], (but strike out [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#SS|SS]]; original gloss <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעוֺלָם‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעִילֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Ezek.26.16|Ezek 26:16]] — exterior garment, ***robe***, worn over the inner tunic <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׃ כְּתֹנֶת‎</span> 

**1.** worn by men of rank: Saul and Jonathan [[1Sam.18.4|1Sam 18:4]]; [[1Sam.24.5|1Sam 24:5]]; [[1Sam.24.12|1Sam 24:12]] (twice in verse); princes of the sea [[Ezek.26.16|Ezek 26:16]] Job [[Job.1.20|Job 1:20]]; [[Job.2.12|Job 2:12]] Samuel [[1Sam.15.27|1Sam 15:27]]; [[1Sam.28.14|1Sam 28:14]] Ezra [[Ezra.9.3|Ezra 9:3]]; [[Ezra.9.5|Ezra 9:5]] David clothed with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בוץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[1Chr.15.27|1Chr 15:27]] (in the procession of the ark); the child Samuel had <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָטֹן‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[1Sam.2.19|1Sam 2:19]] — (it had a skirt <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כנף‎</span> [[1Sam.15.27|1Sam 15:27]]; [[1Sam.24.5|1Sam 24:5]]; [[1Sam.24.12|1Sam 24:12]] (twice in verse)). 

**2.** worn by the daughters of David [[2Sam.13.18|2Sam 13:18]] (but probably strike out, see above) 

**3.** robe of high priest (only [[BDB#P|P]]): <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעִיל הָאֵפוֺד‎</span>, made of purple stuff, [[Exod.28.31|Exod 28:31]]; [[Exod.29.5|Exod 29:5]]; [[Exod.39.22|Exod 39:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אפוד ומעיל‎</span> [[Exod.28.4|Exod 28:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּעִיל‎</span> [[Lev.8.7|Lev 8:7]], having <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּלֵי הַמְּעִיל‎</span> skirts [[Exod.28.34|Exod 28:34]]; [[Exod.39.24|Exod 39:24]]; [[Exod.39.25|Exod 39:25]]; [[Exod.39.26|Exod 39:26]], around which were alternate coloured pomegranates and golden bells, and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּי הַמְּעִיל‎</span>, an opening or hole by which it might be drawn over the head [[Exod.39.28|Exod 39:28]]. 

**4.** figurative of attributes (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, and of men), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קנאה‎</span> [[Isa.59.17|Isa 59:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צדקה‎</span> [[Isa.61.10|Isa 61:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משׁפט‎</span> [[Job.29.14|Job 29:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בשׁת‎</span> [[Ps.109.29|Ps 109:29]]. 

II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַ֫עַל‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלה‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>. p. 751, 758f[<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹ֫עַל‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲלֶה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲלָה‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלה‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲלִיל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲלָל‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלל‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲמָד‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעֳמָד‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עמד‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲמָסָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עמס‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲמַקִּים‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עמק‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַ֫עַן‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲנֶה‎</span> below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָה‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲנֶה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲנָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲנִית‎</span> see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ענה‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֹנָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עון‎</span>.
